Summary: Very large grey rock type meteor, I could have sho
divs: Sighting Details1 Sitting on front poarch.2 Looking up at sky and object suddenly appeared.3 A large meteor.4 Followed it with my eyes from the NE sky until it disappeared in the directionof the Gulf of Mexico.5 Huge - possiblly the size of a bus or larger, grewy rock-like in appearance.It was emmiting smoke, blue, yellow and red, and rotating clockwise and movingSouth. It was almost symeterical.6 Kept moving until I could no longer see it.After witnessing this, I called sheriffs department, newspaper and Coast Guard,as well as air control, everyone was disinterested.
